019package com.plotsquared.core.command;
020
021import com.google.inject.Inject;
022import com.plotsquared.core.permissions.Permission;
023import com.plotsquared.core.player.PlotPlayer;
024import com.plotsquared.core.util.Permissions;
025import com.plotsquared.core.util.TabCompletions;
026import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
027
028import java.util.Collection;
029import java.util.Collections;
030import java.util.LinkedList;
031import java.util.List;
032import java.util.stream.Collectors;
033
034@CommandDeclaration(command = "dislike",
035        permission = "plots.dislike",
036        usage = "/plot dislike [next|purge]",
037        category = CommandCategory.INFO,
038        requiredType = RequiredType.PLAYER)
039public class Dislike extends SubCommand {
040
041    private final Like like;
042
043    @Inject
044    public Dislike(final @NonNull Like like) {
045        this.like = like;
046    }
047
048    @Override
049    public boolean onCommand(PlotPlayer<?> player, String[] args) {
050        return this.like.handleLike(player, args, false);
051    }
052
053    @Override
054    public Collection<Command> tab(final PlotPlayer<?> player, final String[] args, final boolean space) {
055        if (args.length == 1) {
056            final List<String> completions = new LinkedList<>();
057            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_COMMAND_PURGE_RATINGS)) {
058                completions.add("purge");
059            }
060            final List<Command> commands = completions.stream().filter(completion -> completion
061                            .toLowerCase()
062                            .startsWith(args[0].toLowerCase()))
063                    .map(completion -> new Command(null, true, completion, "", RequiredType.PLAYER, CommandCategory.INFO) {
064                    }).collect(Collectors.toCollection(LinkedList::new));
065            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_RATE) && args[0].length() > 0) {
066                commands.addAll(TabCompletions.completePlayers(player, args[0], Collections.emptyList()));
067            }
068            return commands;
069        }
070        return TabCompletions.completePlayers(player, String.join(",", args).trim(), Collections.emptyList());
071    }
072
073}
